title: Okaramon
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Seal

left mar LLC: [ 遠志 ] {Tōshi}; LLC in bottom margin, in grey
description: people dressed in kimonos in front of an elaborate white, green and yellow gateway with three snarling carved animals on top; woman in foreground wearing green and purple kimono, LLQ
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
